adm:constants.name: name
adm:constants.description: The human-readable name of the ADM.

adm:constants.name: organization
adm:constants.description: The name of the issuing organization of the ADM.

adm:externally-defined-data.name: bp_node_id
adm:externally-defined-data.description: The node administration endpoint

adm:externally-defined-data.name: bp_node_version
adm:externally-defined-data.description: The latest version of the BP supported by this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: available_storage
adm:externally-defined-data.description: Bytes available for bundle storage

adm:externally-defined-data.name: last_reset_time
adm:externally-defined-data.description: The last time that BP counters were reset, either due to execution of a reset control or a restart of the node itself

adm:externally-defined-data.name: num_registrations
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of registrations

adm:externally-defined-data.name: num_pend_fwd
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles pending forwarding

adm:externally-defined-data.name: num_pend_dis
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles awaiting dispatch

adm:externally-defined-data.name: num_in_cust
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles

adm:externally-defined-data.name: num_pend_reassembly
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles pending reassembly

adm:externally-defined-data.name: bundles_by_priority
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles for the given priority. Priority is given as a priority mask where Bulk=0x1, normal=0x2, express=0x4. Any bundles matching any of the masked priorities will be included in the returned count

adm:externally-defined-data.name: bytes_by_priority
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bytes of the given priority. Priority is given as a priority mask where bulk=0x1, normal=0x2, express=0x4. Any bundles matching any of the masked priorities will be included in the returned count.

adm:externally-defined-data.name: src_bundles_by_priority
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles sourced by this node of the given priority. Priority is given as a priority mask where bulk=0x1, normal=0x2, express=0x4. Any bundles sourced by this node and matching any of the masked priorities will be included in the returned count.

adm:externally-defined-data.name: src_bytes_by_priority
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bytes sourced by this node of the given priority. Priority is given as a priority mask where bulk=0x1, normal=0x2, express=0x4. Any bundles sourced by this node and matching any of the masked priorities will be included in the returned count

adm:externally-defined-data.name: num_fragmented_bundles
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of fragmented bundles

adm:externally-defined-data.name: num_fragments_produced
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles with fragmentary payloads produced by this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: num_failed_by_reason
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles failed for any of the given reasons. (noInfo=0x1, Expired=0x2, UniFwd=0x4, Cancelled=0x8, NoStorage=0x10, BadEID=0x20, NoRoute=0x40, NoContact=0x80, BadBlock=0x100)

adm:externally-defined-data.name: num_bundles_deleted
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles deleted by this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: failed_custody_bundles
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundle fails at this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: failed_custody_bytes
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number bytes of fails at this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: failed_forward_bundles
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number bundles not forwarded by this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: failed_forward_bytes
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bytes not forwaded by this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: abandoned_bundles
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles abandoned by this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: abandoned_bytes
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bytes abandoned by this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: discarded_bundles
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bundles discarded by this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: discarded_bytes
adm:externally-defined-data.description: number of bytes discarded by this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: endpoint_names
adm:externally-defined-data.description: CSV list of endpoint names for this node

adm:externally-defined-data.name: endpoint_active
adm:externally-defined-data.description: is the given endpoint active? (0=no)

adm:externally-defined-data.name: endpoint_singleton
adm:externally-defined-data.description: is the given endpoint singleton? (0=no)

adm:externally-defined-data.name: endpoint_policy
adm:externally-defined-data.description: Does the endpoint abandon on fail (0=no)

adm:report-templates.name: full_report
adm:report-templates.description: This is all known meta-data, EDD, and VAR values known by the agent.

adm:report-templates.name: endpoint_report
adm:report-templates.description: This is all known endpoint information

adm:controls.name: reset_all_counts
adm:controls.description: This control causes the Agent to reset all counts associated with bundle or byte statistics and to set the last reset time of the BP primitive data to the time when the control was run
